title: The Day After (1983) - Nuclear War DVDrip
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0085404/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0085404/</a>


A graphic, disturbing film about the effects of a nuclear attack on the U. S., as imagined during the Cold War. One may ask who are the luckiest - those who are killed, or those who survive.


Picture quality is not great, I suspect that my DVD was a bootleg, but the film is so rare that it's worth watching. Quality is much better than a VHSrip.

Look out for a very young Steve Guttenberg (Cocoon, The Boys from Brazil)

Widescreen, original mono.
XviD 576x320, AC3.
127 minutes, so I'll give it 800 Mb.
